summary: This is an automatic out-of-office email reply from an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) indicating they are traveling for work and may have delayed email responses. It references an 'Epstein report' and suggests contacting other AUSAs on the case for urgent matters.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: The sender of the automatic out-of-office email reply, who is traveling for work and handling the 'Epstein report' case.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) was actively working on an 'Epstein report' case as of December 13, 2019.
The AUSA was traveling for work, indicating ongoing case activity or related work travel.
Other AUSAs were assigned to the same case and could be contacted for urgent matters.
The email subject references an 'Epstein report', confirming the document pertains to the Epstein investigation.
